name: Pearl Izumi Elite Tall Socks - Women's
description: Super-smooth toe area keeps these socks comfortable and snag-free through long rides.Elite Transfer yarns provide excellent moisture transfer to keep your feet dry during your entire ride.Mesh ventilation over top of foot for maximum breathability.Flat toe seam for comfort in tight-fitting shoes.Anatomic arch compression for a performance fit.15cm cuff height for increased coverage.
